attributes.action: Remove the Red tape helping the victims of anti-social neighbours
attributes.additional_details: My self and other people I know are suffering with this problem it affects peoples mental health by the added stress witch will increase the load on the NHS
attributes.background: Temporary regulation to allow local government to bypass the need of the victims of anti-social behaviour i.e. loud music, having to producing a log over a period of time, helping  victim of such behaviour to resolve the nuisance earlier, due to the stay at home order the victim is exposed 24/7

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about noise nuisance, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to help local authorities tackle it. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
